Purpose: Helm chart repository for downloading Wiz charts
Notes: Primary Helm chart repository for wiz-kubernetes-integration umbrella chart
Dependency charts still reference this URL in Chart.yaml

Purpose: Public Azure Container Registry for wiz-broker connector and admission-controller images
Private Azure Container Registry for wiz-sensor images
Notes: Requires image pull secret with username/password authentication
Additional registry option for Wiz images

Purpose: FedRamp-compliant Azure Container Registry for FIPS images
Notes: Only required if isFedRamp: true or clientEndpoint: fedramp

Purpose: Wiz API endpoint for connector authentication and data transmission
Notes: Primary API endpoint for wiz-kubernetes-connector to send cluster data

Purpose: Wildcard for all Wiz service endpoints and domains
Notes: Covers all Wiz API endpoints including regional variations and service domains
For accessing Wiz portal and documentation

Purpose: Azure Container Registry wildcard (if using private ACR)
Notes: Only if hosting Wiz charts in private Azure Container Registry

Purpose: GitHub raw content for Helm installation scripts
Notes: Only if installing Helm via script
Only if deploying nginx-ingress-controller alongside Wiz

Purpose: Azure Key Vault for secret management
Notes: Only if using Azure Key Vault with External Secrets Operator
Only if using Flux CD for GitOps-based deployment
Only if using Istio sidecar mode with Wiz components
